description:
You thought you saved humanity already? On the Brink: Mutation DLC brings a fifth, special, highly dangerous and purple, disease to eradicate.

During infections, the Mutation will pop up unpredictably and becomes a new disease to fight in contaminated cities. Making the game more challenging than ever before, this disease divides the team’s efforts and will cost them precious time.

You’ll need to plan ahead and coordinate the whole team to fight the new virus and find a cure for the 5th disease.
name: Pandemic: On the Brink - Mutation
